title: Being demoted sucks.
body:
So, I recently got to Gold 4, gained/lost LP, and then was demoted after one game at 0 LP.

And then lost 3 games in a row.

Now, don't get me wrong, Gold 5 isn't all that bad. I still get my rewards. I don't, however, like the idea of just sitting here and giving up. Being demoted sucks, and almost always makes me want to rip my hair out. *Great! Now I have to win 5 games in a row just to get back to where I was!*

I believe the worst that's happened to me was being demoted all the way from Bronze 1 to Bronze 4. I have the S3 Bronze toilet trophy to account for that.

How much do demotions bother you?
